channel.title: Need Help With Error (From Removing Thread Per Client Tut)
channel.description:
Ok, I followed the tut on removing thread per client and I have an error or something. I did everything and I get this when I run my server:
[code]Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1519 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x5dbedba inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2c59311 inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x3c6557a inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x2584d18 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x5dbedec outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2c59343 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x3c655ac outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x2584d4a Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1520 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x15654ca inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x386e17f inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x2a3bf7b inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x5d07020 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x15654fc outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x386e1b1 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x2a3bfad outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x5d07052 Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1521 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x1bfc9e0 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0xcff40e inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x57aac13 inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x22f526c outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x1bfca12 outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0xcff440 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x57aac45 outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x22f529e Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected from localhost:1522[/code]
It doesn't open my Control Pannel anymore, my friends list doesn't work, and it kills you at login for the first time. I'm using allstarscape source. What's wrong? Someone said I needed to copy my run() method from my client.java and add it to the process() in the IOClient.java but I don't know...

item.title: Need Help With Error (From Removing Thread Per Client Tut)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Ok, I followed the tut on removing thread per client and I have an error or something. I did everything and I get this when I run my server:

Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1519 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x5dbedba inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2c59311 inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x3c6557a inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x2584d18 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x5dbedec outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2c59343 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x3c655ac outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x2584d4a Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1520 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x15654ca inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x386e17f inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x2a3bf7b inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x5d07020 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x15654fc outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x386e1b1 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x2a3bfad outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x5d07052 Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1521 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x1bfc9e0 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0xcff40e inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x57aac13 inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x22f526c outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x1bfca12 outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0xcff440 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x57aac45 outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x22f529e Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected from localhost:1522

It doesn’t open my Control Pannel anymore, my friends list doesn’t work, and it kills you at login for the first time. I’m using allstarscape source. What’s wrong? Someone said I needed to copy my run() method from my client.java and add it to the process() in the IOClient.java but I don’t know…
